Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Nice coffee place located in a beautiful bookstore. The staff is very friendly and skilled. The seating is spacious and has a classic and timeless vibe. This Belgium Vascobelo is reachable by elevator or escalator. The machine they use makes amazing coffee.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Very good caffeteria i side the bookstore. The service is very professional and it is a quiet place in the craziness of Amsterdam. They have a variety of coffees that you can enjoy seated in one of their tables or carrying it through the bookstore. Don't miss the apple strudel.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Sophisticated cafe, with a Lovely ambiance nestled inside a large book store. A oasis of calm in the heart of the bustling Amsterdam center. Friendly service and fresh simple food.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: It’s located on the first floor of Scheltema Book Store. Ambient is night, service is good. Perfect coffee and very tasty apple pie.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: good coffee, but places to put lids are dusty, all the lids are full of dust and not so clean

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Truly a perfect place for a quiet lunch or just a good cup of coffee. The coffee is especially great because Vascobelo is a well known Belgian coffee brand, and the staff definitely knows how to prepare a good cappuccino! The ambiance is …

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: A perfect place for a rainy afternoon with a good cup of coffee, a laptop and ambiance. The personnel at the bar is outstanding, the place is located inside Scheltema bookstore in Amsterdam, a nice opportunity to browse around for books and literature.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Vascobello is the place where you can relax and reset with a sandwich and a good cup of coffee. It is the place for people that are attracted into the complicated though irresistible love triangle of good coffee, cosyness, books and utterly …

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Decent food and drinks and a nice bookstore atmosphere.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: It is always very relaxing to spend some time to have a coffee in Vascobelo. Their "Iced Coffee" was great today. It is expensive yes but it's worth.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Vascobelo is known for good coffee and it never disappoints. Great coffee and service  at a cozy corner inside the bookstore, perfect for a quick coffee break during your book hunt.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text:
Great coffee in an even greater bookstore.
What's not to like?!?
Recommended for book and coffee lovers.
Grabbing a bite is also possible

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Nice and cozy little cafe, within the bookstore. Coffee is nice (proper espresso) and they also serve some snacks and cakes. Nice ambient, bookstore gives the extra point.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Young guy helping us yesterday was a sweetheart, but the african american guy behind the counter was very unfriendly, and not for the first time. He does not let you speak up, cuts you off, does not smile or meet your eyes, as if he could not bother with you. Bad experience for the third time with that same guy.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: The place is very nice and the staff is friendly, however, I couldn't find any vegan options on the menu. My friends also had problems finding something to eat, they tried to order some pies but most of the options were out.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Very nice café inside the book store. I had a cappuccino and it was delicious! The pastry also looked very good.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: For me this is the the best coffee in AMS. As well, i have started buying lately Vascobelo coffee blended for mocha machine.... All i can say  EXCELLENT.  Bravo Bravo.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: One of the best cafes in the Dam area and a real hidden gem.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Good coffee, unique atmosphere, overall nice experience

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Perfect coffee. Lovely little bites served with the coffee. Great smoked salmon sandwich.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Great coffee, cozy atmosphere, friendly people.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Excellent coffee, but the service in this branch, unlike the others, was unfriendly.

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Fresh, high quality food accompanied by great coffee!

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: lovely staff and amazing coffee :)

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Good quality food, quiet

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Great coffee! ☕

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Excellent place to spent some time...

Name: Vascobelo V-bar
Review Text: Nice place.
